questions.quote: Hey, Jerry, remember Frogger? I used to be so into this game. Gettin' that frog across the street was my entire life.
Ah, what kind of a man are you? The guy is unconscious in a coma and you don't have the guts to kiss his girlfriend?
I just talked to Dr. Dembrow's son. He said they almost had to call the police.
Yes, sir, I believe everything is all squared away. Isn't it, Mr. Kramer?
Oh, ah, let's see, we've got two. There's a big one down the hall there and a small one over here. You know I should ask Jack.
Hey, do you believe I got Happy New Yeared today? It's February.
So, Jerry, if my investors don't get Cubans, the whole deal's off.
My parents told me you were too neurotic and that I was making a mistake.
Oh listen, guess what? Cheryl convinced Ping to drop the case against me.
Jerry, Jerry. Lloyd says it's no problem. He's capable of locating the gum.
